name: com.ecsphysics2d.core
description: This is an ECS-compatible wrapper for the UnityEngine.LowLevelPhysics2D Physics engine. The physics engine is struct-based, multithreaded, high performance, and out of the box DOTS compatible.

samples.description: A collection of `Element` mounting functions working with Unity's Addressable Assets.
A simple UI with state and actions to demonstrates the core patterns of ECS-React.
A basic RPG-like battle system to demonstrates more advanced patterns of ECS-React.
